title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 861.30 - Waste load allocations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 861.30 - Waste load allocations

State Regulations

Waste load allocations will be made by the executive
director in accordance with these regulations. Every allocation shall be
met: (a) by an existing waste treatment
facility; (b) in accordance with an
abatement schedule duly adopted and approved by a signatory party, with respect
to an existing project; and
(c) at
all times with respect to a new project. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
861.30

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
